metadata.title: Professional moving services
metadata.description: Moving company in Israel. Apartment moves, office moves and small deliveries across Sharon, Center, South, North and the Jerusalem area.
metadata.keywords: moving, relocation, transport, area selection, Sharon, Center, South, North, Jerusalem

homeHero.title: WANT TO BOOK A MOVE?
homeHero.submitLabel: to calculate the cost of transportation

servicesPage.title: Our services
servicesPage.description: We provide a full range of professional moving services across Israel. Every job is handled by an experienced team with modern equipment.
servicesPage.metaTitle: Moving services | Leading moving company in Israel
servicesPage.metaDescription: Professional moving services for any need: apartments, offices, and small deliveries. Fair prices and attentive service.

features.title: Modern equipment
features.description: We use the latest equipment for safe, professional moves

features.title: Availability 24/7
features.description: We are available for you any time, every day

features.title: Fair pricing
features.description: Transparent pricing with full property protection

servicesPage.ctaDescription: Contact us today for a free quote with no obligation. We are happy to help with any move!

calculatePage.title: Calculate cost
calculatePage.description: Tell us the origin, destination, and date so we can build your quote immediately.
calculatePage.metaDescription: Estimate your moving cost across Israel by providing your route and preferred date.
calculatePage.placeholderNotice: A full pricing form will appear here soon. We have stored the details you provided.
calculatePage.missingData: No data was provided. Please return to the home page and complete the form.
